name: GridClient
description: The main client class for the Grid SDK that provides comprehensive functionality for account management, authentication, and transaction processing.

AccountManagement.name: createAccount
AccountManagement.description: Creates either an email-based account (requires OTP verification) or a signer-based account (immediately active).

AccountManagement.name: getAccount
AccountManagement.description: Retrieves comprehensive account details including account type, policies, signers, thresholds, and metadata.

AccountManagement.name: updateAccount
AccountManagement.description: Updates account settings and configuration such as policies, signers, thresholds, and metadata.

AccountManagement.name: getAccountBalances
AccountManagement.description: Retrieves the current token balances for an account, including native SOL and SPL tokens, with optional filtering and pagination.

AccountManagement.name: getTransfers
AccountManagement.description: Retrieves the transaction history for an account, including incoming and outgoing transfers, with filtering and pagination support.

Authentication.name: initAuth
Authentication.description: Initializes authentication for an existing user as the first step in the authentication process.

Authentication.name: completeAuth
Authentication.description: Completes email-based authentication by verifying the OTP code and establishing an authenticated session.

Authentication.name: completeAuthAndCreateAccount
Authentication.description: Combines authentication completion with account creation for streamlined onboarding.

Authentication.name: refreshSession
Authentication.description: Refreshes an MPC provider session to extend its lifetime and update authorization keys and tokens.

ContextManagement.name: getContext
ContextManagement.description: Retrieves the current Grid client context, including configuration and user-related information.

KycVerification.name: requestKycLink
KycVerification.description: Generates a link for KYC identity verification that users can complete through a hosted flow.

KycVerification.name: getKycStatus
KycVerification.description: Retrieves the current status of a KYC verification process, including completion state and verification level.

KeyManagement.name: generateSessionSecrets
KeyManagement.description: Generates session secrets for supported providers to be used during authentication and signing operations.

Other.name: extractSignableTransaction
Other.description: Extracts a Solana VersionedTransaction from a Grid transaction response, ready to be signed with solana-web3.js.

Other.name: setExternallySignedTransaction
Other.description: Injects an externally signed transaction into a Grid transaction object so it can be submitted via the Grid API.

PasskeyManagement.name: getPasskeys
PasskeyManagement.description: Retrieves all passkeys associated with an account.

PasskeyManagement.name: addPasskey
PasskeyManagement.description: Registers a new passkey credential for an account.

PasskeyManagement.name: removePasskey
PasskeyManagement.description: Removes an existing passkey credential from an account, revoking its ability to authorize transactions.

PasskeyManagement.name: createPasskeyCredentials
PasskeyManagement.description: Initiates WebAuthn credential creation for registering a new passkey with the userâ€™s authenticator.

PasskeyManagement.name: getPasskeyCredentials
PasskeyManagement.description: Initiates WebAuthn authentication using an existing passkey credential.

PasskeyManagement.name: extractPasskeyCreateParams
PasskeyManagement.description: Parses URL search parameters to extract passkey creation parameters.

PasskeyManagement.name: extractPasskeyAuthParams
PasskeyManagement.description: Parses URL search parameters to extract passkey authentication parameters.

PasskeySessions.name: createPasskeySession
PasskeySessions.description: Starts a new passkey authentication session, preparing challenge and session data for WebAuthn.

PasskeySessions.name: authorizePasskeySession
PasskeySessions.description: Submits passkey authentication data to authorize an existing passkey session.

PasskeySessions.name: submitPasskeySession
PasskeySessions.description: Finalizes a passkey session, generating final session tokens and account access credentials.

PasskeySessions.name: findPasskeyAccount
PasskeySessions.description: Searches for an existing passkey account using credential information.

PasskeySessions.name: getPasskeyAccount
PasskeySessions.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific passkey account, including session status.

PaymentProcessing.name: createPaymentIntent
PaymentProcessing.description: Initiates a payment intent for fiat-to-crypto conversion into a specified account.

SpendingLimits.name: createSpendingLimit
SpendingLimits.description: Creates a new spending limit for an account with defined amount, token, and period.

SpendingLimits.name: updateSpendingLimit
SpendingLimits.description: Modifies parameters of an existing spending limit such as amount, period, or signers.

SpendingLimits.name: deleteSpendingLimit
SpendingLimits.description: Deletes a spending limit, removing restrictions for the associated token.

SpendingLimits.name: useSpendingLimit
SpendingLimits.description: Uses an existing spending limit to authorize a transaction within its constraints.

SpendingLimits.name: getSpendingLimit
SpendingLimits.description: Retrieves a specific spending limit by its address.

SpendingLimits.name: getSpendingLimits
SpendingLimits.description: Retrieves all spending limits configured for an account.

StandingOrders.name: createStandingOrder
StandingOrders.description: Creates a new standing order for recurring payments.

StandingOrders.name: getStandingOrders
StandingOrders.description: Retrieves all standing orders for an account, including active, paused, and completed schedules.

StandingOrders.name: getStandingOrder
StandingOrders.description: Retrieves detailed information about a specific standing order.

TransactionProcessing.name: prepareArbitraryTransaction
TransactionProcessing.description: Prepares an arbitrary Solana transaction for signing by adding metadata, fees, and smart account integration.

TransactionSigning.name: sign
TransactionSigning.description: Signs a transaction, automatically selecting the appropriate authentication provider from the session context.

TransactionSigning.name: signAndSend
TransactionSigning.description: Signs and sends a transaction using the appropriate authentication provider based on session context.

TransactionSigning.name: send
TransactionSigning.description: Submits a prepared and signed transaction to the Solana network through the Grid API.

Utilities.name: decodeSignature
Utilities.description: Decodes a transaction signature into a structured representation.

Utilities.name: getExplorerUrl
Utilities.description: Builds a Solana explorer URL for a given transaction signature and optional cluster.

Utilities.name: getSessionKeyObject
Utilities.description: Helper function to create session key object from string and expiration time.

VirtualAccounts.name: createVirtualAccount
VirtualAccounts.description: Creates a new virtual account associated with a smart account.

VirtualAccounts.name: requestVirtualAccount
VirtualAccounts.description: Creates a virtual bank account that allows users to receive fiat deposits which are automatically converted to cryptocurrency.

VirtualAccounts.name: getVirtualAccounts
VirtualAccounts.description: Retrieves all virtual accounts associated with a smart account, with optional filtering.

VirtualAccounts.name: getVirtualAccount
VirtualAccounts.description: Retrieves details for a specific virtual account.

VirtualAccounts.name: updateVirtualAccount
VirtualAccounts.description: Updates configuration or metadata for a virtual account.

VirtualAccounts.name: deleteVirtualAccount
VirtualAccounts.description: Deletes an existing virtual account from a smart account.

VirtualAccounts.name: getVirtualAccountDeposits
VirtualAccounts.description: Retrieves deposits associated with a virtual account, with optional filtering and pagination.
